name: Physics Kombat lll
description:
Learning science has never been so easy! Physics Kombat III - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 10th class Physics. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Physics Kombat III to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Learn Physics in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Reflection and Refraction of Light
Human Eye
Electricity
Magnetic Effects
Sources of Energy
Management of Resources

Additional

-Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
- Single player game with no number crunching required
